channel.title: Just a quick question;)
channel.description:
Alright, i have made a server b4 and like 2 days ago Rogers shut us off, so we got Bell, i did my enviromental vertebraes or w/e and there set; i have portforwarded, and my windows firewall is off, and in the exception tab RSPS, 43594, TCP> So i don't really know; but at first my server ran but i was wondering why no1 logged in, so i checked to see if it worked and it didnt, i checked on a Status checker and it said it was off; so i fooled around, etc,etc> then came to a point i can't run my server now, my server is 508; z508 But coded and stuff; so i duno if any of you have a clue then please comment/or w/e here is what it says:
Java.net.bindexception: address already in use: JVM_Bind
at java.net.plainsocketimpl.socketbind(Native Method) at java.net.plainsocketimpl.bind(unknown source) at java.net.serversocket.bind(unknown source) at java.net.serversocket.(init)(unknown source) at java.net.serversocket.(init)(unknown source) at net.com.codeusa.net.socketlistener.(init)(socketlistener.java:40) at net.com.codeusa.server.main(server.java:58) Press any key to continue...
Really need some help
Any answers are appreciated (try to keep them about my post)
-Rej3ctz

item.title: Just a quick question;)
item.dc:creator: @mangalover51 mangalover51
item.description:
@mangalover51 wrote:

it’s not really sorry… i really wanted to laugh at something… finally thanks bro…

Read full topic

item.title: Just a quick question;)
item.dc:creator: @Rej3ctz Rej3ctz
item.description:
@Rej3ctz wrote:

[quote=“mangalover51, post:2, topic:335004”]first it’s enviromental variables >.< you made me laugh <-- not trying to be mean… thanks for that laugh bro…

and it means something in the files is either in use… or you already have a server up… or you have something running on port 43594 or whatever port your server is on… something like this not for sure totally i run 317’s ;)[/quote]

Lol srry just not too sure, fell on my head on my rollerblades and been skuh-rood up since, lol ty

Read full topic

item.title: Just a quick question;)
item.dc:creator: @mangalover51 mangalover51
item.description:
@mangalover51 wrote:

first it’s enviromental variables >.< you made me laugh <-- not trying to be mean… thanks for that laugh bro…

and it means something in the files is either in use… or you already have a server up… or you have something running on port 43594 or whatever port your server is on… something like this not for sure totally i run 317’s

Read full topic
